thread.section_title: Hotel Crayon Rouge by Elegancia - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean & friendly
thread.title_full: Clean & friendly - Review of Hotel Crayon Rouge by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Pete P
title: Clean & friendly
text:
We booked superior room for two, everything was like expected. Staff was friendly, location is near shopping street (Les Halles).
The superior room had nice shower. Wc is separated from it, and that worked well. Decoration was simple, minimal, funny and clever.
Thanks and bonjour for the hotel staff, both of us felt for being welcomed! Merci!
